name: Britney Wilson
text: DMEI are amazing! Super knowledgeable and responsive. They are always willing to jump on a call with me to discuss my needs and help guide me through the best options for my business. They have a wide variety of resources that practically make them a one-stop-shop for digital marketing.

resp.text: Thank you so much Britney for your 5 star review!  We enjoy working with you and helping your business grow.

name: Proper townsend4
text: I have seen sales more than triple in the insurance business and was truly impressed by DMEI’s work making this happen. The staff is professional, friendly, and there to help! I love this group and would recommend them for your business!

resp.text: Thank you!  We were happy to help your business get more phone calls and quality leads!

name: Ashley Bagwell
text: Love the group at Digital Marketing! Donnia has been wonderful!  She stops in or calls to check on us and always answers any questions I have as well as getting updates done to my webpage very promptly! Excellent customer service!!

resp.text: Ashley, we appreciate you choosing us as your marketing partners.  It has been a pleasure watching your business grow and working with such a great group of folks!

name: Sharonica Daniels
text: The professionals at DMEI brought my business out of a hole from another marketing agencies mishaps.  I am now swamped with business and having to find another building to work out of!  They offer great marketing services and offer a ton of FREE advice.  I was astounded at the results and tell everyone I know they need to choose them for any marketing!

resp.text: Thank you Sharonica! We were so happy to help you out.  If there is anything else we can help with just let us know!

name: Maranda Harley
text: One of the best marketing places around! They are sweet and always trying to do what is best for you! Thank y’all for all y’all do! 🙂

resp.text: Thank you Maranda! We are always happy to help!

name: Harold Harvey
text: I recently started a new ecommerce business and was struggling to market my it online.  After touching base with Donnia about marketing I signed up and now in my third month of advertising on the Google Shopping Network I have seen an influx of revenue.  Not only am I staying afloat but I am actually bringing home a paycheck!  I highly recommend the Digital Marketing Experts International team for any new ecommerce business! You will not be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your business. We love working with you.

name: Christian Harvey
text: Great company with great people. Answered every question and met my every need.

name: Blake Huey
text: Love the marketing and the free advertising options .. not to mention the service is phenomenal

resp.text: Thank you Blake! We appreciate your awesome review!

name: Kelly Ratcliff
text: Great local marketing company that helped me get my website launched and after just a few months my calls went from 10 to 50 a month.  Now, I have more business and I have this company performing my social media management as well as Local SEO.  You cant ask for a better team of digital marketing professionals!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly for your kind words.  We appreciate your business!

name: Tukker Watson
text: I now have more business then I can handle because of my website !! Thank y'all .

resp.text: Thanks Tukker we enjoy working with you.

name: Chris Davis
text: You want to grow you need to call these people !!!! I own several business and they def know what they are doing !

resp.text: Chris Davis your awesome and we appreciate your business.

name: Kelsey Barnard Clark
text: Amazing local marketing agency, very professional.

resp.text: Thank you Kelsey! We love helping local businesses succeed!

name: D Davis
text: Great company to do business with very affordable!  $$$$$$ is key and they saved me a ton and made me a ton !

resp.text: Thanks Darcy we appreciate your business.

name: L.A. Jones
text: Does not deliver what they promise and does not pay their employees.

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear that you feel this way. But you as well as we know the words are not true.
